answers.answer: I was told I was measuring smaller. So I also got scheduled and ultrasound. Mine is on Tuesday.
My son was measuring 5 weeks bigger at my 3d ultrasound at 30 weeks. My belly was measuring 4 weeks larger. My son was born on October 23 and he was 5 weeks early...born at 34 weeks 6 days!
With my second i Measured bigger i just had a really large baby he weighed 8.14 Don't stress out to much
Yeah , but my daughter weighed 8.14 pounds . & I do not want a big baby...
Mine said the baby was measuring big and during the ultrasound he was actually measuring smaller.
I meant she was 8.13 pounds . It just scares me a little! You never know what to expect when pregnant , that's why i'm never doing this again .
I have measured ahead twice now....but my doctor really hasnt said much...just that baby is big...

When I was 28 weeks, by uterus measurements, i was measuring at 33 weeks. I went for an ultrasound, and he's about a week and a half ahead of where he should be. My fluids are fine, no gestational diabetes, hes just a little ahead of the game.

question: Have You Been Told By Your Doctor That You Were Measuring A Lot Larger Than At Your Last Visit? They Just Scheduled Me An Ultrasound, She Said It May Be Fluid OR The Baby Is Measuring A Lot Bigger .
title: Anyone Can Answer. . .
